title: Magdaleno Mercado
text: Magdaleno Mercado Gutiérrez (4 April 1944 – 6 March 2020) was a <a href="Mexican%20people">Mexican</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who played for <a href="Mexico%20national%20football%20team">Mexico</a> in the <a href="1966%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1966 FIFA World Cup</a>. He also played for <a href="Club%20Atlas">Club Atlas</a>.
